CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Atium
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: Atium
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Atium is the god metal of the Shard Ruin. It grants its user visions of others' immediate futures, offering immense strategic advantage in combat and prediction.
